course_title: Special Topics: Human Health: Sights and Sounds of Health
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 19 / Seats Avail: 8Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: This course will explore our perception of sights and sounds.  We will investigate how visual and auditory stimuli contribute to, or disrupt, our health and well-being, how their processing pathways may be disrupted, and potential interventions to restore these critical sensory modalities.
course_description: Seminar of lecture series of topics in human health. May be repeated for credit when topic varies. Credit varies from one to four hours.
sections: Class Nbr: 2723, Section #: 3, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: Freeman/Noble, Status: Open
